name: Breads
description: Handcrafted small-batch Sourdough, French, and Italian breads. Enjoy our artisanal loaves, custom orders, and fresh dinner rolls, made with care and the finest ingredients.

name: Cakes, Cheesecakes & Cupcakes

name: Brunch
description: Our brunch menu brings together comforting classics and savory delights made from scratch. From fluffy quiches and loaded egg bakes to herb-scented biscuits and crêpes, each dish is crafted with care and rich flavors. Customize your plate with a variety of fillings, sauces, and seasonal ingredients—perfect for leisurely mornings and hearty appetites.

name: Pies, Cobblers & Galettes
description: Our pies, cobblers, and galettes celebrate the richness of seasonal fruit and timeless comfort. From buttery lattice-topped pies to rustic open-faced galettes and bubbling cobblers with golden biscuit crusts, each treat is made by hand with love and premium ingredients. Ask us about custom fillings and rotating seasonal specials!

items.name: Rustic Seasonal Galette
items.description: Free-form tart with options like cinnamon apples, grilled peaches with burrata, or stone fruits.

items.name: Berry Cobbler
items.description: Mixed seasonal berries baked with vanilla biscuit topping.

items.name: Pecan Pie
items.description: Toasted pecans in a rich brown sugar custard with flaky pie crust.

items.name: Pumpkin Pie
items.description: Pumpkin in a rich butternut custard with flaky pie crust.

items.name: Chocolate Cream Pie
items.description: Rich chocolate custard in a flaky pie crust with whipped cream and chocolate shavings

items.name: Apple Pie
items.description: Classic apple pie with flaky crust and spiced apple filling.

items.name: Banoffie Pie
items.description: Banana,chocolate, toffee, and whipped cream in a graham cracker crust.

items.name: Lemon Meringue Pie
items.description: Tart and creamy lemon custard in a flaky pie crust with toasted meringue.

items.name: Peach Cobbler
items.description: Fresh peaches baked with vanilla biscuit topping.

name: Bamboloni
description: Our Bamboloni are handcrafted Italian doughnuts made from enriched brioche dough for an irresistibly soft, airy texture. Each one is filled with decadent creams, curds, or jams and finished with unique coatings for a perfect bite. We also offer custom flavors and seasonal varieties to keep things deliciously fresh.
